raw_body: Loving son of late Vaithialingam Tyagarajah and late Sethurajah Jothimani, beloved husband of Kalvi, precious father of Rishya (UK), father-in-law of Kavitha (UK) and devoted grandfather of Ria (UK and Esha (UK), brother-in-law of late Jegatheeswaran (Bapu) and Ophelia, Uma and Noeline Jeganathan, Lakshmi Jeganathan, late Sridharan and late Rajini Jeganathan, late Hariharan and Lyn (UK), expired peacefully on 20th February 2024. Viewing at A.F. R
